short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple Cristiano Ronaldo-themed new tab extension speeds up your browser with a search bar and site shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cristiano Ronaldo-themed Chrome new tab extension stands out with its minimalist design. It keeps your tabs clutter-free while providing quick access to your favorite sites. With the added features of a search bar and shortcuts to frequently visited pages, this extension enhances both functionality and aesthetics. Designed for Ronaldo fans, it makes your browsing experience more personal and efficient. Download now and customize your browser today!
